name: A day at work
description:
***A quick word***

Use my Direct Paypal link for your donations/tips if you get errors from Itch.io. By using my Paypal link, you can pay me in any currency accepted by Paypal.paypal.me/FlorinPain.

Thank you very much for your support!

I made this short game to raise some awareness about the working conditions and the low wages someone aged 18-21 can find. But this game is not about increasing the minimum wage. Instead, this game is telling you that instead of waiting for the wages to increase, you should go to an University and set the wages for yourself.

Fun to play and quite addictive!

Available exclusively for Windows PC
